thread.title: BRIEF-International Bancshares Corporation Announces Extension Of Stock Repurchase Program

title: BRIEF-International Bancshares Corporation Announces Extension Of Stock Repurchase Program

organizations.name: brief-international bancshares corporation announces extension of stock repurchase program
extension of stock repurchase program reuters staff international bancshares corp

text:
April 27, 2018 / 7:02 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-International Bancshares Corporation Announces Extension Of Stock Repurchase Program Reuters Staff
International Bancshares Corp:
* INTERNATIONAL BANCSHARES CORPORATION ANNOUNCES EXTENSION OF STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM
* INTERNATIONAL BANCSHARES CORP - APPROVED EXTENSION OF ITS STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
